text: Ani jyanni imana rakhale te mhanatata ki ekhadi suraha (adhyaya) ka nahi avatarita keli geli, maga jevha ekhadi spasta arthaci suraha avatarita keli jate ani ticyata jihadaca ullekha kela jato, tevha tumhi pahata ki jyancya manata roga ahe, te tumacyakade asa prakare pahatata jase to manusya pahato, jo mrtyune murchita jhala asela. Tevha phara cangale hote tyancyakarita
